application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1.	Balsam Poplar	Rear Garden:Reduce Height by 5m (regrowth) and crown spread by 1.5-2m. Remove dead branches.The tree's current height is 19m and crown spread is 12m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 14m and the crown spread is 10m.T2.	Lime TreeFront Garden outside no:1 Pollard to previous points. (approx. 3m of regrowth from the height) The tree's current height is 9m and crown spread is 4m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 6m and the crown spread is 3m.T3.	Lime Tree	Front Garden outside no:3 Pollard to previous points. (approx. 3m of regrowth from the height) The tree's current height is 9m and crown spread is 4m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 6m and the crown spread is 3m.4	Limes/Holm Oak	Frontage: Lightly light to clear footpath by 2.5m and street sign by 1.5m to allow clear view for motorists. The tree's current height is 15m and crown spread is 8m - After the proposed works, the tree's height is 15m and the crown spread is 8m.
